summary: Task management web application for creating, updating, and tracking tasks with user authentication, CRUD operations, optional real-time updates, and responsive design
architectural_notes: Full-stack application structure with API integration
Dynamic data handling for task management
WebSocket support for optional real-time updates

existing_features.title: Implement user authentication and authorization using Internet Identity integration
Implement create task functionality allowing users to add new tasks with title, description, status, and due date
Implement read/list task functionality displaying all tasks for the authenticated user with filtering by status
Implement update task functionality allowing users to edit task details and change task status
Implement delete task functionality allowing users to remove tasks
Implement responsive design that adapts seamlessly to desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes

Apply a cohesive visual design system with a professional, productivity-focused aesthetic using clean typography, consistent spacing, and a modern color palette that avoids blue and purple combinations

new_feature_requests.summary: Responsive design for web and mobile screens
Create backend data model and API for tasks with fields: title, description, status (pending/in-progress/completed), due date, and created timestamp
